entry.title: Entry #1110 in The New York Times Company v. Microsoft Corporation, 1:23-cv-11195
entry.summary: ORDER: The Court shall hear oral argument on OpenAI' s objections (Dkt. Nos. 638 and 925) to Magistrate Judge Wang's September 19, 2025 Opinion and Order regarding the ChatExplorer logs (Dkt. No. 604) and to Judge Wang's November 24, 2025 Opinion and Order regarding attorney-client privilege and the deletion of the Books1 and Books2 datasets (Dkt. No. 846) in Courtroom 23A of the Daniel Patrick Moynihan United States Courthouse on January 16, 2026, at 2:00 p.m. SO ORDERED. (Oral Argument set for 1/16/2026 at 02:00 PM in Courtroom 23A, 500 Pearl Street, New York, NY 10007 before Judge Sidney H. Stein.) (Signed by Judge Sidney H. Stein on 1/6/2026) Filed In Associated Cases: 1:25-md-03143-SHS-OTW, 1:23-cv-11195-SHS-OTW (jca) (Entered: 01/06/2026)
